com.moviejukebox.allocine

Interface AllocineAPIHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAllocineAPI, JSONAllocineAPIHelper, XMLAllocineAPIHelper

    public interface AllocineAPIHelper
    The Allocine API. This is for version 3 of the API as specified here: http://wiki.gromez.fr/dev/api/allocine_v3
